dcterms:creator: K. Soomro

dcterms:description: The UCF-101 benchmark is a widely adopted dataset for human action recognition, which contains 13,320 video clips manually annotated into 101 human actions, totaling 27 hours.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:description: Columbia Consumer Videos (CCV) consists of 9,317 videos collected from YouTube belonging to 20 categories, including 'basketball', 'wedding dance', 'soccer', etc.
dcterms:title: Columbia Consumer Videos (CCV)
